pr_title: Fix invalid handling of List<String> in spring-data-jpa custom queries

timeline.bodyText: Minor gripe: if I understand the logic of this method right, I think you already handle the isIntLongOrBoolean case at the beginning of the method. And I think we should better handle all these special cases there.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: You are absolutely correct! I'll fix it
replies.author: geoand
